      • postXAuth

        public org.scribe.model.Token postXAuth(String email,
                               String password)
        Posts an XAuth request. A new method is needed because the response from the server is not a standard Tumblr JSON response.
        Parameters:
        email - the user's login email.
        password - the user's password.
        Returns:
        the login token.
